amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by DOE to propose efficiency standards for ceiling fan light kits, residential dishwashers and vending machines.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to research, draft, propose, or finalize the Notice of Proposed Rulemaking that was published by the Department of Energy on December 19, 2014, titled "Energy Conservation Program...".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Buck.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A064) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
